QuestData.Title: Blood in the Tides
QuestData.Description:
We do not have sirens in Zandalar, but our sailors know of dem. In Zandalari, we call dem bwon'tulak - de death singers.
My ship was run aground and my fellow sailors all murdered by de death singers.
Jane saved my life, so now I help to protect dese people.
Sirens are a plague on da seas, no matter who ya serve. Run the tides red wit dere blood!
